channel.title: Exion issues
channel.description:
Hi, When I talk to the old wise man to get a skillcape it freezes and I have to exit.... Any solutions? I just downloaded Exion today and I learned alot, I don't want this to ruin my future server :(
----
The mute command and ipmute doesnt work..... any suggestions?

item.title: Exion issues
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

This was a problem with the one of the ints in the skillcape shop’s method, I cannot exactly remember which part of code; PM Exion, he has fixed this on his server.

[quote=“David Shift, post:2, topic:358732”]PERHAPS YOU SHOULD SCAN IT FOR PROBLEMS?!

LOOKS GOOD TO ME[/quote]WIN
